name: Learn Dvorak Dark Mode (Bruhdooh) v1.1
description: I made a dark mode for learn.dvorak.nl, since the main color of the website was an eye-burning yellow.

user.name: Bruhdooh
user.about:
I make styles and type moderately fast.

Highest WPM: 160

additional_info:
Version 1.0: Released 1/18/2019
Version 1.1: Reversed the colors on the pop-up keyboard to highlight the keys you should be using better.
